content.p: Find out more information about the range of services we offer to support you. Explore the services available to you as a graduate from our Careers and Employability teams. Find out how you can order copies of degree certificates and graduate transcripts from our online shop. The university has a wide range of accommodation available for visitors to our campuses. You can access the fantastic sports facilities across our campuses with an alumni sports membership for £32.90 a month. You can hold your special day in the beautiful surroundings of University Park, with special rates available for alumni. You can apply for library membership, giving you access to our eight libraries, for an annual membership fee of £25 (plus VAT). Learn new skills, make professional connections and give back to the community by volunteering for the university. Explore our opportunities and register your interest to get involved. Browse volunteering opportunities
